welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Giuliano Milanese! This charming city is known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and beautiful scenery. We invite you to explore and experience all that our wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost airlines such as Ryanair.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.
